actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in United States v. Mark J. Haggerty, et al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Senate in United States v. Mark J. Haggerty, et al. in support of the constitutionality of the Flag Protection Act of 1989.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in United States v. Mark J. Haggerty, et al.
